recipesJson.name: Neon Cream Clone
recipesJson.author: Imagineight
recipesJson.description:
This is my take on a Lost Fog Neon Cream clone. It's not exact but I've come to like this even more than the original.

I've been mixing this for well over two years but always love criticism and suggestions to make this better.

reviews.text: Nice mix here! This mix has a wonderful tropical "Neon" sherbet feel to it. It's creamy, bright, tropical, and delicious. There is a slight floral note and I normally don't like floral notes, but in this mix it's very well balanced and I think it adds to the over-all mix and makes it better. Nice work here Imagineight!
